metadata.title: CVE-2024-27409 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:dmaengine: dw-edma: HDMA: Add sync read before starting the DMA transfer inremote setupThe Linked list element and pointer are not stored in the same memory asthe HDMA controller register. If the doorbell register is toggled beforethe full write of the linked list a race condition error will occur.In remote setup we can only use a readl to the memory to assure the fullwrite has occurred.
